author: ggregory
msg: [LANG-734] The CHAR_ARRAY cache in CharUtils duplicates the cache in java.lang.Character.
[LANG-735] Deprecate CharUtils.toCharacterObject(char) in favor of java.lang.Character.valueOf(char).

author: veithen
msg: AXIOM-379: Always decode the attachment while reading from the MIME message instead of buffering the encoded content. Also make sure that the DataHandler instances created by Attachments actually return the decoded content.
